__comment: Use ${REPONAME} for the name of the repository
Use ${DAY} for the current day of the month

files.name: .gitgitgoc
text: # This is a comment
# Set the provider
provider=${GITHUBNAME}
# Set your full name
fullname=Philipp B.
# Set your github name
githubname=${GITHUBNAME}

files.name: README.md
files.description: This is a template for a README.md file
text: <div align="center">
${REPONAME}
Description
<!-- Badges -->
<div align="center">
<a href="https://github.com/${GITHUBNAME}/${REPONAME}/releases">
<a href="https://github.com/${GITHUBNAME}/${REPONAME}/blob/master/LICENSE">
<a href="https://github.com/${GITHUBNAME}/${REPONAME}/stargazers">
<a href="https://github.com/${GITHUBNAME}/${REPONAME}/commits/master">
* [Bugs](#bugs)
* [Release Notes](#release-notes)
## Bugs
* *no known bugs*
## [Release Notes](https://github.com/${GITHUBNAME}/${REPONAME}/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
### [v0.0.1](https://github.com/${GITHUBNAME}/${REPONAME}/tree/0.0.1)
* *Initial release*
by [${FULLNAME}](https://github.com/${GITHUBNAME})

files.name: CHANGELOG.md
files.description: This is a template for a CHANGELOG.md file
text: # CHANGELOG *${REPONAME}*
## [v0.0.1](https://github.com/${GITHUBNAME}/${REPONAME}/tree/0.0.1) (${YEAR}-${MONTH}-${DAY})
* *Initial release*

files.name: ideas.md
files.description: A file to collect ideas for the project
text: # IDEAS *${REPONAME}
- [ ] This is an idea example

files.name: .phil-project
text: ignore
#logo:assets/logo.png
#logo_small:assets/logo_small.png
#description_translate:de
#version:0.0.1

files.name: src/main.py
files.description: A main.py file for python projects
text: def main():
print("Hello World!")
if __name__ == "__main__":
main()

files.name: .prettierrc.json
files.description: A prettier config file for web projects
text: "trailingComma": "es5",
"tabWidth": 4,
"semi": true,
"singleQuote": true
